pullRequest.body:
This was supposed to be included in #11344, as even the module docstring shows

Inspired by the sphere-eversion project (but golfed and slightly extended).
Also, use namespace AmpleSet in the file.

---

nodes.body:
Thanks for the good suggestions. I added two more commits; the first one uses the namespace `AmpleSet` (now that sufficiently many lemmas use it); the second tweaks the docs very slightly.
awaiting-review

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:

```suggestion
open scoped Pointwise

```

Otherwise I would probably think this is an `open ... in`

```suggestion
    AmpleSet (y +ᵥ s) ↔ AmpleSet s := 
  AmpleSet.image_iff (ContinuousAffineEquiv.constVAdd ℝ E y)
```
(untested)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: translations of ample sets are ample
